heading: Great Britian
content: At Oak Tree, we believe in Britain. We are proud that all our chairs, beds and bath lifts are designed and manufactured in Great Britain.

heading: Rated Five Star
content: Our vision for a different kind of mobility company means we have a five-star customer satisfaction rating from our customers.

heading: Approved
content: All our products are occupational therapist approved by an experienced medical expert, offering you complete peace of mind.
